experiences.description:
CGPA: 3.96/4.0 

 **Academic Achievement** 
 • 2nd Winner - IEEE Innovation Competition 2022 
 Project Title: Developing Talent Prediction System with Combination of Personality Tests using Predictive Analytics 
• Project Presenter - 4th International Conference on Innovation and Technopreneurship (ICIT) 2021 
• 4 times President's Honor Roll recipient
• 1 time Dean's Honor Roll recipient

**Clubs & Societies | Leadership**
• INTIMA Mass Communication Club | Chairperson, 2022 | Vice Chairperson, 2021 | Secretary, 2021 | Media Publicity, 2020

**Club & Societies Achievements**
• 26th INTIMA Best Affiliate - Mass Communication Club
• 25th INTIMA Most Outstanding Council Member, 2021
• 25th INTIMA Best Academic Event - MCW2021

achievements.title: 26th INTIMA Best Affiliate Award - Mass Communication Club 2022
Mass Communication Club 2022 - Chairperson
achievements.description: Group photo with the General Committee of Mass Communication Club in 2022.

achievements.title: INTI IU Chinese New Year Night Event 2020 - Publicity
achievements.description:
One of the publicity of INTI IU Chinese New Year Night Event 2020 organized by Chinese Cultural Society.
• Made posters to publicize the CNY event.
• Made event T-shirt design.

achievements.title: INTI IU Chinese New Year Night Event 2020
achievements.description: Group photo with the event crew of INTI IU Chinese New Year Night Event 2020.

achievements.title: Mass Communication Week 2019
achievements.description: Group photo with the event crew of Mass Communication Week 2019.

achievements.title: Mass Communication Week 2019 - Multimedia Coordinator
achievements.description:
One of the multimedia coordinator of Mass Communication Week 2019 organized by Mass Communication Club.
• Assisted in producing a JINGLE for the event, which included song recording and video production.

achievements.title: Mass Communication Club Bonding Trip 2019
achievements.description: Having a bonding trip with members of the Mass Communication Club in Melaka to strengthen our relationship.

experiences.description:
Dual Award Program in collaboration with INTI International University. 

**Academic Achievement** 
 • Coventry University Best Student Award (CGPA: 3.96), Jan 2022
• Coventry University Best Project Award, Jan 2022
Project Title: Developing Talent Prediction System with Combination of Personality Tests using Predictive Analytics

achievements.title: Best Project Award
achievements.description: The Final Year Project, titled 'Developing a Talent Prediction System with a Combination of Personality Tests using Predictive Analytics', was nominated and selected as the Best Project among more than 50 peers after undergoing an interview session by Coventry University.

achievements.title: Best Student Award
achievements.description: Awarded by Coventry University as the best student with the highest CGPA among peers in the same batch.
